author: ritchiem
msg: QPID-1764 : Update to BaseTransactionLog to create a TestableTransactionLog, which will replace TestableMessageStore. Update to BaseTransactionLog/Test to work correctly with transactions

and to fully test that functionality. Updated StoreContext to know when it is in a transaction as relying on a payload being set is not sufficient as that is not set when running with the MessageMemoryStore and so transactional testing in the BTLT was not correct.
Update to Virtualhost to correctly set the RoutingTable when the specified TransactionLog is wrapped in a BaseTransactionLog.

author: tabish
msg: new patch for UTF-8 reader/writer code in openwire wireformat.

author: jukka
msg: Reorganized the jcr-rmi trunk so that the integration tests can be included as a separate module. Unfortunately they can not be embedded as a submodule of the normal jcr-rmi component as only projects with "pom" packaging can have modules.
